wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Carroll "Pat" Hewson (2 June 1926 - 28 March 2017) was an English former footballer who played as a full-back.Hewson played in The Football League for Gateshead between 1953 and 1958 after a spell at West Bromwich Albion. He was also on the books at Northern League side Crook Town earlier in his career.
